game.name: Train Simulator: Arizona Divide: Winslow - Williams Route Add-on
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Climb aboard to experience fast-paced, challenging, and memorable railroading on the famed Santa Fe Railway, with the Arizona Divide: Winslow - Williams Route for Train Simulator!
